Desc.entry: Weekly 2 hour drama classes and workshops for children and adults, suitable for all abilities from beginner to drama school entry. LAMDA examinations, annual production and performances. Taught by professional actors, all staff are CRB checked and first-aid trained.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Drama classes: Mon 4.30-6.30pm (aged 6-11years), 6.30-8.30pm (aged 11-16 years), 8-10.30pm (youth group aged 16-19 years), 7.15-9.15pm (adult class), Tues 5-7pm (aged 6-11 years and 11-16 years), Fri 5-7pm (aged 11-16 years), Sat 10am-12noon (aged 6-11years), 12noon-2pm (aged 11-16 years), 2-4pm (aged 6-11 years)
